item.title: Memory Sheet
item.description: Algebra Modulus There are 2 kinds of problems typically asked in the Modulus topic. Equality problems Where the problem involves an equality with a modulus, either on one side or both sides of the equation, simply resolve the modulus by using the \( \pm \) sign. For e.g., to solve, $$ \begin{array}{rcl} |2x + 1| & = & |x + 5| \\ \therefore 2x + 1 & = & \pm (x + 5) \\ \therefore 2x + 1 = x + 5 & OR & 2x + 1 = -(x + 5) \\ \end{array} $$ Inequality problems
